name: membership-app
description: MERN membership management app with email verification, dynamic forms, file uploads, share links, and admin dashboard.

scripts.dev: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$server = Start-Process -PassThru -FilePath npm -ArgumentList 'run','dev:server' -WorkingDirectory 'server'; $client = Start-Process -PassThru -FilePath npm -ArgumentList 'run','dev' -WorkingDirectory 'client'; Wait-Process -Id $server.Id,$client.Id"
